title: I Found Wardens Hidden Base and Loot in Minecraft

comments.comment: The fact that he actually tries his best to make the new episodes wholesome but still ends up accidentally murdering his loved ones is impressive.
I love how he always does this type of things unintentionally, but they end up being part of the lore.

"If I see him, I'll scream"
What an effective plan
The fact that you first played this update in your Hardcore Word is badass. Everyone else went on to creative mode and tried it out, but not you. You just went right into it. Hardcore Respect
I love how this kid friendly series has turned into a horror game XD
I love how PewDiePie completely discards insanely tense situation with “snowball ha”
I love how he saves everyone from the Warden and then ends with THAT.
pewds is very lucky the warden did not have his sonic scream at this point in the update, otherwise hed be dead
It's incredible how much this game has evolved, that Warden base looks insane
The official second most terrifying arc. Up there with the underwater rescue arc
it isn't a pewdiepie minecraft series without losing friends along the way
Love how Felix accidentally created the most suspenseful drama with the Warden. It's so risky for his year old world and yet because of it it's so intense to watch.
2:09 The scream of pure fear when he saw the warden explains a lot about the new update
I love how the Deep dark has a Dark, Blueish motif and Pewds base has a Bright, Crimson Red motif, it's like they're made to fight each other.
"Why did I put lava in my base?" is equivalent to "Well if it isn't the consequences of my own actions"
The fact this dude was in hardcore mode and survived multiple warden encounters and still be alive surprised me

This episode had everything. The enemy took over the base and the first one just ended. Pewdiepie had to flee just to infiltrate his own base and fight the enemy he freed everyone. And after all that an unexpected ending where something drastic happend you could literally roll credits after that because that was just a season finality
It's incredible how much joy can a grown man have, while exploding Wardens home...
We never realize how bad our base design is until there is a loose warden in it
i love the motivational music sive always uses it’s so sarcastic it makes the scene even funnier

Warden is a really short tempered, buff guy that just wants to relax and meditate
. The big candles for serenity 
. Requirement to be quite around so as to not disturb its Zen
The plot twists.....and the ending.....fantastic episode

Tip: The Warden is classified as an undead mob, use Smite V for maximum damage and throw potions of instant healing (undead mobs gets damaged by healing pots). Drink milk to get rid of darkness effect and bring wool blocks next time.

P.s This is useless now... Just run.
I can't believe I reached the last episode of the minecraft series. Now I feel empty. come back pewds :((
Next Episode : "Donkey was like a father to me."

Pewds : “my beloved donkey and my beloved bonkey”
Donkey and bonkey : “guess we’re gonna die next”

"Did you execute the Warden?"
"Yes"
"What did it cost?"
"Donkey"
i love how he ends the video off with him telling donkey that he is gonna let him out to celebrate, and kills him. and his brain takes 10 seconds to register that he killed him.
“Don’t worry, it was all staged Donkey is fine” is what I tell myself before going to bed.
The most CHAOTIC ending. Justice for bonkey

As soon as Pewds said he's freeing Donkey, I knew Donkey's life-insurance has expired.

Rest in piece, you loyal steed who stuck around until the end (in a minecart).
Pewds counting skills when shooting arrows is impeccable.
pewdiepies survivability rate in hardcore is anime protagonist level
The amount of father figures pewdiepie have is both wholesome and concerning

Pewds: screams and runs away

Also Pewds: “I’m not scared, I wasn’t scared.
Watching this series again from episode 1. Takes about a month for me to watch it all. This series is definitely my favourite piece of entertainment ever. Thankyou

This video was like a movie. The thrills, the tension and the joy of the hero winning its all there. Classic Pewdiepie. 
Btw RIP Donkey, you were like a father to Pewds
Gosh I hope this series is never ending, Felix gameplay is insane
I went through so many emotions in this episode. This was great.
Kinda funny how the last episode of the series (at least for now) has him fighting the literal strongest mob in the game. Even though it didn’t treat it like one, this is a great finale.
The ability of giving your best and still being able to fuck things up is outstanding

The most intense part about leaving bonky behind was that the Warden will actually kill other mobs
Just imagine if the Warden could break blocks and chase after you.
UPDATE: HIGHEST LIKES ON A COMMENT!!!

This man went through a rollercoaster of emotions

Terror, malevolence, joy, relief and finaly sadness

 : New Plan!

Pro Tip : The Depths has a unique enchantment in it's loot table, its called "Sneak Speed". If you put it on your boots, it will give you faster sneak speed. In Level III, it could even give you [7:18] a sneak speed that's the same as old walking
1:20 That "Baba Boi " with accent is legendary.
Someone tell him totems dont work because of his attack speed. The warden can just do two extrememly fast consecutive attacks so its better to have a shield
Bad ending: the sound of the TNT activated all the spawners and there is now an army of Wardens on their way to destroy him
The amount of fear I felt during this episode was... natural
Just rewatched the whole series. I hope he comes back one day
As soon as the Warden spawned in, my heart was beating so fast, one of the scariest moments ive seen in any Pewdiepie minecraft playthrough

6:15 “luckily torches don't ignite TNTs ”
Minecraft series #1 flashbacks

This was so intense, I was invested the entire time.
Moment of silence for Donkey.
Let us also remember the sacrifice that Spider made, he was like a father ... to all of us.
I love how a game like Minecraft manages to bring back the old Pewds to us

Donkey: in on piece right?
I love how Pewds laughed while killing scary things in Resident evil The Village but this Warden terrifies him beyond words xD
This series has a special place in my heart.

Pewdiepie, please return back to Minecraft Hardcore series, there are lots of things that had change and I really miss of these series, so please come back . (Note, warden can actually shoot you with sonic boom charge so be careful).

The mere fact that the warden can kill every single mob as long as it hears sound I'm that nervous for it to be in Minecraft officially. As I said before I hope the loot is worth it. They best give us something special
I love how he was more tense and scared during this episode than the entire Elden Ring playthrough :D
the warden is considered an undead mob so using  a trippleshot crossbow with instant health arrows should kill him in around six shots assuming you hit all three arrows each time
He fell in love with a spider within like 2 seconds of meeting the guy & then it died.  Truly emotional.

Okay so if you're wondering why the lights activate the sculk blocks are supposed to function like a wireless redstone. So it's beneficial to get lighting and all that stuff working but it can also summon the warden. So that's kind of a disadvantage
